meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a convex molding having a quarter circle profile.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter added decorative ovoli to the door frame.
meanings.sent2: The ovoli on the ceiling gave the room a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten tried to catch the moving ovoli shadows.
meanings.sent4: Her smile created an ovoli of happiness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast a warm ovoli on the wall.

meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a type of ancient Greek coin.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various ovoli from different time periods.
meanings.sent2: Collectors sought after rare ovoli to add to their collection.
meanings.sent3: The old man jokingly claimed he had an ancient ovoli in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang like a valuable ovoli in the air.
meanings.sent5: The moon shone like a silver ovoli in the night sky.
